QADataPairs.question: What is ComfyUI-GTSuya-Nodes and what does it do?
QADataPairs.answer: ComfyUI-GTSuya-Nodes is an extension for ComfyUI that adds wildcard support, allowing you to use __name__ syntax in your prompt to retrieve a random line from a text file named name.txt in a wildcards directory.

QADataPairs.question: How can I install ComfyUI-GTSuya-Nodes in an existing ComfyUI installation?
QADataPairs.answer: To install ComfyUI-GTSuya-Nodes, you should navigate to the custom_nodes folder in your ComfyUI installation, clone the GTSuya-Studio/ComfyUI-Gtsuya-Nodes repository, and restart ComfyUI.

QADataPairs.question: How do I use Simple wildcards in ComfyUI-GTSuya-Nodes?
QADataPairs.answer: To use Simple wildcards, create a 'wildcards' directory in the ComfyUI root folder. Add the Simple wildcards node, and enter your prompt along with the wildcard words enclosed in double underscores (__name__). You can add as many wildcards as you want.

QADataPairs.question: How is Simple wildcards (Dir.) different from Simple wildcards?
QADataPairs.answer: Simple wildcards (Dir.) allows you to choose any directory on your hard drive containing wildcards files, rather than requiring them to be in the ComfyUI root directory.

QADataPairs.question: How do I use Wildcards Nodes in conjunction with Random Line nodes?
QADataPairs.answer: To use Wildcards Nodes, you need to link them with Random Line nodes from [Hakkun-ComfyUI-nodes](https://github.com/tudal/Hakkun-ComfyUI-nodes). Enter your prompt with wildcard entries corresponding to the Random Line nodes, indicated by double underscores around the str#.

QADataPairs.question: What is Danbooru (ID) and Danbooru (Random) node used for?
QADataPairs.answer: Both Danbooru (ID) and Danbooru (Random) nodes allow you to get image URLs and tags lists from [Danbooru](https://danbooru.donmai.us/) website. They can be used in conjunction with the Load Image From URL node from [comfyui-art-venture](https://github.com/sipherxyz/comfyui-art-venture) to import images into ComfyUI.

QADataPairs.question: How can I use the Replace Strings node in ComfyUI-GTSuya-Nodes?
QADataPairs.answer: To use Replace Strings, link it to two text nodes: the 'text' entry where you want to replace or delete strings, and the 'replace_list' entry containing the list of words to replace or delete, with one string replacement per line separated by a | (e.g., string1|string2).

QADataPairs.question: How does the Random File From Path node work?
QADataPairs.answer: The Random File From Path node selects a random file path from a specified directory. For images, it can work with [Load Image From URL](https://github.com/sipherxyz/comfyui-art-venture) nodes to import an image directly into ComfyUI.
